703094f-a.text:
641 Barbey Street, east side, between Dumont and Livonia Aves., showing what was once the New Lots Schoolhouse, built in 1810. It stood originally west of the cemetery opposite the New Lots Dutch Reformed Church, on the north side of New Lots Ave., (then Road). P.S. No. 72 now occupies the site.
About 1900.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
703094f-a.folder: Barbey Street & Dumont Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
